import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import './style.css' const TodoList = () => { const [addItem, setAddItem] = useState('') const [items, setItems] = useState([]) const inputData = () => { setItems([[...items, addItem]]) /* if(!addItem){ alert("dsh kjkdjfhdkjs") } */ } return (
) } export default TodoList
